MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoates. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.37am to carry out a repair on an electricity box located on Sannox Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.42am on Tuesday 20th October 2020.
